QuestData.Title: A Desperate Plea
QuestData.Description: The note in this bottle is soaked through, but still legible.$b$bIn it, the author claims to have escaped from some sort of undersea naga prison.$b$bHe is clearly in fear for his life, and you can't help but wonder if it might be one of your recently abducted shipmates.$b$bAt a loss as to how to locate the escapee, you determine to share the find with Erunak.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Soggy Note to Erunak at Shallow's End.
QuestData.RewardText: If he still lives, I may be able to locate this poor soul.
